DOC.HEAD: NBC's `Today' to Have Four Former Hosts As Guest Hosts
DOC.TEXT: With Jane Pauley set to leave ``Today'' on Dec. 29 after 13 years, NBC on Monday said four former ``Today'' hosts, including anchorman Tom Brokaw, will co-anchor it the first week in January. All will work with co-host Bryant Gumbel, the first of them NBC commentator John Chancellor, appearing Jan. 2. The next day, the guest host will be Hugh Downs, now on ABC's ``20-20'' series, with Joe Garagiola on Jan. 4. Brokaw is to co-anchor Jan. 5.
